name: 9.18 "I'm Getting My Act Together and..." Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who got their fist stuck in their mouth?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	The gang was doing "tricks with digits" when Lilith stuck her whole fist in her mouth. When it got stuck Frasier told them, "This happens to her more often than you'd think."

questions.text: Why can't Sam or the others at Cheers get into Sam's office, and therefore the storage room?
questions.correct: Rebecca locked herself in the office.
options: Woody locked himself in the office.
Sam locked himself in the office.
Carla locked herself in the office.
questions.explanation:
Rebecca locked herself in the office.

	Since deciding not to marry Robin, Rebecca has been an emotional wreck. She's most upset that Robin still had money.

questions.text: Why did Carla say they asked Frasier for help?
questions.correct: He pouts if they don't ask him.
questions.explanation:
He pouts if they don't ask him.

	This made Frasier pout as well. Upset, he decided maybe he'd go home.

questions.text: Who cut his finger with "that putty thing"?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	He was trying to get Rebecca out of the office. When he said he was going to get a tetanus shot she came out and gave him a band-aid.

questions.text: When Rebecca told Frasier she wanted to "sit here for the rest of my life," what did Norm say?
options: Who wouldn't want to sit here forever?
questions.explanation:
Maybe it's this stool.

	Rebecca was sitting on Norm's stool. Norm had no desire to go anywhere but his stool.

Woody's.

	She decided to leave the bar for a while and needed to get out of her wedding dress. Woody asked Sam to find some clothes for him out of the lost and found.

questions.text: Whose clothes did Sam find in the lost and found?
questions.explanation:
Cliff's.

	Carla said deep down inside they all knew it was Cliff's clothes. Cliff said they ended up in the lost and found in the 1970s because he was streaking. The others didn't want to hear him say he was streaking because the thought of him naked was so gross.

questions.text: What book did Frasier read to the gang?
questions.explanation:
A Tale of Two Cities.

	"A Tale of Two Cities" was written by Charles Dickens. Frasier wanted to show them how good literature could be. When they showed no interest, he started to add things such as "and there was a blood thirsty clown".

questions.text: Where was Rebecca going on the plane?
questions.explanation:
San Diego.

	San Diego is where Rebecca was from originally. She told Sam she wanted to forget Boston and start a new life.

questions.text: What plan did Sam say he could use with Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Z.

	Plan Z was a plan where Sam pretended to have a gay lover. Rebecca told him to either kiss Leon or admit to everyone that he's a "wussy little 'fraidy cat". When he kissed Leon, Leon slugged Sam in the face.
